post.title: Pandasite
post.content:
Pandasite

Finally, after a long time, we're happy to announce and introduce the Pandasite - a new website for panda-lang organization. As a part of alpha release cycle, we've add some extra sections with interesting content like:

  • News - regularly posted set of articles about changes and future updates
  • Guide - simple introduction into the Panda world and its features

It's also time to say goodby to the old one:

So goodby, you served us well ðŸ’•
